text: Mwaziririjwe (kurya) icyipfushije, amaraso, inyama y’ingurube, icyabagiwe ikitari Allah, ikishwe kinizwe, ikishwe gikubiswe, icyapfuye gihanutse, icyapfuye gitewe ihembe n’ikindi, n’icyariwehon’inyamaswa (kigapfa) uretse icyo mwabashije kubaga kitarapfa), ndetse n’icyabagiwe ibigirwamana. (Mwaziririjwe kandi) kuraguza (mushaka kumenya ibizababaho); ibyo byosekuri mwe ni ukwigomeka ku mategeko ya Allah. Kuri ubu, babandi bahakanye bataye icyizere (cy’uko mutakivuye) mu idini ryanyu, bityo ntimukabatinye, ahubwo abe ari njye mutinya. Uyu munsi mbuzurije idini ryanyu, kandi mbasenderejeho inema zanjye, nanabahitiyemo ko Isilamu iba idini ryanyu. Ariko uzasumbirizwa n’inzara atari ukwigomeka (akarya ibyaziririjwe, nta cyaha kuri we), mu by’ukuri, Allah ni Ubabarira ibyaha, Nyirimbabazi
